description: Alistair McCormick, 64, "ignored" rules upon returning to the Isle of Man from the UK, a court hears.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man resident jailed for quarantine bank visit
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man resident jailed for quarantine bank visit - BBC News
maintext: When arrested by police, the company director accepted he had been "out and about" on the island when he should have been self-isolating, but offered no excuse for his actions.
